message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.google.common.base.Strings' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.core.env.Environment'.
Abbreviation in name 'ignoreSSLCertificateVerification' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
WhitespaceAround: '}' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
